data.name: Penny Stocks 101
data.text: Penny stocks can be risky and volatile, so it's important to do your research and invest only what you can afford to lose.

questions.text: What should you do before investing in penny stocks?
Are penny stocks generally low or high risk?
How much should you invest in penny stocks?

answers.text: What you can afford to lose

data.name: Avoiding Penny Stock Scams
data.text: Be wary of penny stock scams that promise quick profits or use high-pressure tactics. Look for warning signs like unsolicited emails or calls, unverifiable claims, and no real company or product behind the stock.
